text: I have been using EZ PAYROLL and Trusted their service in updating CPF tables as Annually I have the maintenance contract. Unfortunately, after CPF audit, then I realised the Cpf Table is not updated. I take up this issue with them and Mr David push blame to my computer instead of admitting their errors in omitting the updating. Mr David is unable to update the CPF and push the blame to my computer. With doubts on Mr David technical skills, I call for the Support Team and they update the Cpf so easily. Beware of this service provider! I have to give a star inorder to post
